title: 232: Bach Nation News: New Show Host + Rachel Lindsay Leaving Instagram + More Taylor Nolan Tweet Thoughts + MORE!
itunes:title: 232: Bach Nation News: New Show Host + Rachel Lindsay Leaving Instagram + More Taylor Nolan Tweet Thoughts + MORE!
description:
The Broads sit down to chat recent Bachelor Nation news but first they talk about fainting/swooning stories for the first 15 minutes (who knows!). Then they discuss some updated thoughts on Taylor Nolan’s tweets, our new ATFR host, Heather and Sarah missing from the WTA, which ex-Bachelorette contestant wants to be on the next Bachelorette, possible Bachelorettes, Rachel Lindsay leaving Instagram, Rachel Kirkconnell’s recent apologies, and more + they discuss some recent pop culture tea!

 

***To let Extra TV know how much you enjoy Rachel Lindsay email - jeremy.j.spiegel@extratv.com

***Listen to/subscribe/rate 5 stars “HIGHER LEARNING” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/higher-learning-with-van-lathan-and-rachel-lindsay/id1515152489

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***HELIX SLEEP: Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND 2 free pillows at HELIXSLEEP.COM/CHATTY

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM promo code CHATTY to save an additional 15% off your first order!

***HELLO FRESH:Go to HELLORFRESH.COM/CHATTY12 and use code CHATTY12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!

***HOMER: Visit LEARNWITHHOMER.COM/CHATTY to start a free 60 trial!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
